# `cache-directory` changelog

`cache-directory` follows [Semantic Versioning][1].

## 2.0.0 - 2018-03-01

### Changed

* `os.homedir()` is used directly instead of a ponyfill

### Breaking

* Node 4 is now required

## 1.1.0 - 2016-07-23

* Added Windows support

## 1.0.0 - 2016-07-22

### Added

* Initial release

 [1]: http://semver.org/
